title: Project Aurora
description: This princess loves to play and nap wherever her owner is. Choose her if you enjoy affectionate and constant companionship.

title: DataViz Dash
description: This strong boy will make you feel safe — always looking out for you and protecting your heart and feelings.

title: Lazy Tony
description: If you’re into quiet, lazy weekends, Tony is the perfect companion for those days when you don’t want to see anyone.
